title: Former Governor of New Mexico Bill Richardson Dies at 75
description: The Richardson Center for Global Engagement, which he founded and led, said in a statement Saturday that he died in his sleep.

title: Venice Review: Leonard Bernstein Comes to Life, Gloriously, in Maestro
description: 'Maestro,' Bradley Cooper's opus on Leonard Bernstein, is a superb and deeply felt film. Read TIME's review.

title: India Launches a Spacecraft to Study the Sun
description: The Aditya-L1 spacecraft took off on board a satellite launch vehicle from the Sriharikota space center.

title: DeSantis Won’t Meet with Biden During President’s Trip to Survey Idalia Damage
description: Idalia made landfall Wednesday morning along Florida’s Big Bend region as a Category 3 storm.

title: Nobel Foundation Withdraws Invitation to Russia, Belarus and Iran to Attend Ceremonies
description: Saturday's announcement was widely praised in Sweden by politicians.

title: Want to Honor Labor Day? Check Your Paystub
description: Most Americans don’t look at paystubs. But they're a powerful reminder of the American labor movement, writes Elizabeth Tandy Shermer.
